title: The Woman Who Faced New Yorkers’ Wrath Over the MTA
description: As the authority’s first “chief customer officer,” Ms. Meyer worked to connect the public with the transit system’s overseers.
dc:creator: Ana Ley
media:credit: Kholood Eid for The New York Times
media:description: Sarah Meyer was charged with responding to the complaints of New York subway riders as the Metropolitan Transportation Authority’s first chief customer officer.
